name: Harpy
description: Harpies have the upper body of a human woman and the lower body of a bird, with hauntingly beautiful voices.
memorable: Their Luring Song ability charms and incapacitates prey, making them dangerous foes.
goals: To lure and torment unsuspecting travelers before attacking them.
relations: Usually found near cliffs or remote islands, often encountered with other harpies.
environment: High cliffs or remote islands, ambushing travelers and sailors from above.
strengths: Ability to charm and incapacitate enemies with Luring Song; agile with flying speed.
weaknesses: Low hit points and armor class make them susceptible to damage; reliant on charm for effectiveness.
attacks: Attacks with sharp claws dealing slashing damage and can perform dual attacks in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Luring Song, which charms and incapacitates humanoids and giants within range.
senses: Has darkvision with a range of 120 feet, enhancing its stealth capabilities.
skills: Possesses a good stealth modifier, indicating its ability to avoid detection.
additional_information: Known for their cruelty and tormenting behavior.
Can fly, which allows for strategic vantage points during an ambush.
Sings a magical melody to control victims during combat.
Resistant to exhaustion and the frightened condition.
Can repeat its charm ability multiple times if not harmed.
test_queries: winged creature with a beautiful song
monster that charms its prey with singing
humanoid bird monster with dangerous song
